plot: On a Belgian beach at Camping Cosmos. The delegate send by the Ministry is confronted with sex and murder. The residents enjoy their holidays in a peculiar way...
title: Camping Cosmos
plot_es: On a Belgian beach at Camping Cosmos. The delegate send by the Ministry is confronted with sex and murder. The residents enjoy their holidays in a peculiar way...
plot_en: On a Belgian beach at Camping Cosmos. The delegate send by the Ministry is confronted with sex and murder. The residents enjoy their holidays in a peculiar way...

cast.role: Jan Bucquoy - l'animateur culturel duCamping Cosmos
cast.name: Jean-Henri Compère

cast.role: Eve Bucquoy - la fille de Jan
cast.name: Fanny Hanciaux

cast.role: Mme Vandeputte -la plantureuse épouse du gestionnaire du Camping Cosmos
cast.name: Lolo Ferrari

cast.role: M. Vandeputte - le gestionnaire du Camping Cosmos
cast.name: Jean-Paul Dermont

cast.role: Noé Vandeputte - le fils du gestionnaire du Camping Cosmos
cast.name: Noe Francq

cast.role: Claude Semal dit Tintin - l'animateur de la radio du Camping Cosmos
cast.name: Claude Semal

cast.role: Pierre Mertens - le célèbre écrivain entarté lors de son passage à la radio
cast.name: Noël Godin
